src:
UPOZNAJTE ČUKARIČKI: Dva Partizanova bandita, jedan Zvezdin otpadak, superligaški veterani, golmansko otkriće...
Ili kako je Aleksandar Veselinović napravio ozbiljan tim
01 Nov 2019 by Darjan Nedeljković
Kada su ovog leta čelnici Čukaričkog, predvođeni gazdom Galetom Obradovićem, odlučili da prodaju Mudrinskog, Kopitovića i Ovusua mnogi su pomislili da Brđani ove sezone neće juriti visok plasman, već da će forisrati mlađe snage i želeti da postanu tržišno interesantni. Možda je to i bila ideja, ali trijumfom protiv Partizana ekipa Aleksandra Veselinovića je krenula pažnju na sebe. Tri boda u sudaru sa osvajačem Kupa predstavljala su kulminaciju odlične jeseni belo-crnih. Čukarički je drugi na tabeli, igra lepo i disciplinovano. Ovo je priča o momcima koji su trenutno heroji
ĐORĐE PETROVIĆ – Opklada Aleksandra Veselinovića koju može da dobije. Jedan od mlađih golmana Superlige. Na početku ove sezone vraćen je sa pozajmice u IMT-u. Iznenada dobio šansu umesto iskusnijeg Nikole Belića. Primio samo dva gola.
NIKOLA ĆIRKOVIĆ – Superligaški bek. Doveden iz Voždovca da nadoknadi štetu posle teške povrede Miladina Stevanovića. I za sada mu dobro ide. 
STEFAN ŠAPIĆ – Štoper atipične građe, visok preko dva metra, nije bio ni na mapi. Ni u omladinskoj školi Čukaričkog nisu ga smatrali top projektom. Kada je završio školovanje poslat je na pozajmicu u beogradski Sinđelić. Dueli sa iskusnim napadačima, koji se nisu libili da mu udare lakat u rebra, pomogli su mu da napreduje. Da mnogo napreduje. Ni kao igrač, ni kao muškarac Stefan Šapić nije u potpunosti formiran. Vrlo zanimljiv materijal.



DARKO PUŠKARIĆ – Od 2009. godine igra Superligu. Jasno je da pojedine napadače našeg elitnog ranga može da čuva i sa cigaretom u ustima. Trener na terenu, idealan partner mnogo mlađem Stefanu Šapiću koji uz njega može da napreduje. Mnogo dobro poznaje domaću ligu, služi kao konsultant navijačima Crvene zvezde i Partizana kada neko iz domaćih klubova pojača crveno ili crno-bele. Jer se uvek susretao sa nekim. Teško da bi Čukarički bio na drugom mestu da nema popularnog Puške.
MIROSLAV BOGOSAVAC – O njemu se najviše zna. Debitovao je već i za reprezentaciju Srbije. Poslednja četiri prelazna roka priča se i piše da levi bek rođen 1996. godine sigurno napušta Srbiju. Ima nedostataka, pre svega kada je reč o defanzivnoj igri, ali... Niko ne može da pobije činjenicu da je jedan od najboljih bekova u ligi. Savršena kontrola lopte je njegov osnovni adut. Prošao je sve mlađe reprezentativne selekcije, potrajao bi u Partizanu da se Ivan Tomić duže zadržao na klupi. Neko će reći da su crno-beli napravili veliku grešku.
MARKO DOCIĆ – Pravi superligaški veteran. Potreban svakoj ekipi, vezista koga bi svaki trener ovdašnjih klubova poželeo. Tri sezone je bio jedan od najboljih igrača Javora, pre nego što je zadužio opremu Čukaričkog. Odlično izvodi slobodne udarce i penale. Malo je poznato da je leta prošle godine Crvena zvezda, tražeći vezistu iz Superlige, birala između Docića i Dušana Jovančića.



STEFAN KOVAČ – Tokom pionirskih dana bio je možda i najbolji igrač Crvene zvezde. Međutim, počeo je da gubi status, pogotovo kada je klub sa Marakane iz Niša doveo braću Ilić. Nije se razvijao na pravi način, imao je i neoprostive disciplinske ispade zbog kojih je ispaštao. Ipak, na dobrom je putu da napravi solidnu karijeru. Sezona u Srpskoj ligi, u dresu IMT –a, pomogla mu je da očvrsne. Dostigao je superligaški nivo. Videćemo hoće li uspeti da se podigne?
IBRAHIMA NDIJAJE – Kada je igrao u Napretku iz Kruševca iskusni Milorad Kosanović ga je šaljivo zvao Ibra. Klasično afričko krilo. Brz, prodoran, fizički jak. Svakoj ekipi je sposoban da napravi ozbiljan problem. Ima i trenutke dekoncentracije kada uopšte nije prisutan. Popunio je Ovusuove kopačke.
ASMIR KAJEVIĆ – Poslednjih godina, posebno u vreme direktorovanja Vladimira Matijaševića, Čukarički je imao tradiciju dovođenja Cronogoraca. Štoper Kopitović je ostavio solidan utisak, Lagator je mogao i bolje. Uz gazdu kakav je Docić, nekada veliki talenat BSK Borče solidno izgleda u veznom redu.
VELJKO BIRMANČEVIĆ – Pravi bandit iškolovan u Zemunelu, kakav je svojevremeno bio, primera radi, Aleksadar Mitrović. Danas, kada doživaljva dane velike afrimacije, niko ne spori da je ekstremno talentovan i već zreo za ozbiljnije domete. Svi će vam u neformalnim razgovorima reći da treba da oblikuje karakter i temerament, ali da je fudbalska moć – neosporna. Krilni fudbaler u čiji trk i način na koji mazi loptu mora da se zaljubite na prvi pogled. Lako obrađuje i najteže pasove, još lakše prolazi u situacijama jedan na jedan. Prepoznao ga je Ivan Tomić, ali ga je Partizan slao na pozajmice u Rad, potom i Čukarički. Sad je ugovorom vezan za Brđane. Loviće ga jači već sledećeg leta.



SLOBODAN TEDIĆ – Kada se prošle jeseni pojavio na velikoj sceni, igrajući protiv Crvene zvezde na Marakani, pokazao je da bi Brđani u bližoj budućnosti mogli da imaju napadača ekstra klase. Protiv Partizana je odigravao kao Hari Kejn i u šanse izbacivao oba krila. Došao je u Čukarički kao najbolji strelac kadetskog turnira u Bijeljini. Gazda Brđana Gale Obradović i Vladimir Matijašević su iskoristili veliku organizacionu krizu Vojvodine i doveli ga u Beograd. To nije bio bingo, to je bio fudbalski džek-pot. Modernog napadača su prepoznali i u Mančester Sitiju, za koji je Tedić potpisao u transferu vrednom 3.000.000 evra. Morao bi da napravi reprezentativnu karijeru.

IZMENE

LUKA STOJANOVIĆ – Još jedan odbačeni Partizanov sin. Skupo je platio ceh odluci da se još kao tinejdžer preseli u redove Sportinga iz Lisabona. Sat njegove karijere je počeo već da otkucava ponoć, jer mu nije išlo ni na pozajmicama u Muskornu i Apolonu. Međutim, donekle se reahabilitovao u Čukaričkom. Da, donekle... I dalje deluje da nije fizički zategnut, ali i u takvim okolnostima talenat je uočljiv. Ima sve što je potrebno vezistu. Pregled, miran pas, kreaciju, kombinatoriku, dribling i šut.
MILUTIN VIDOSAVLJEVIĆ – Javnost ga je upoznala letos, kada je Čukarički igrao protiv jermenskog Ararata. Dečački se igrao fudbal, zajedno sa Birmančevićem publici na Banovom brdu priuštio 90-minuti ringišpil kojim je vozio četvoricu rivalskih defanzivaca. Uz Tedića najtalentovaniji igrač u rosteru Aleksandra Veselinovića. Mora da popravi realizaciju.



TRENER ALEKSANDAR VESELINOVIĆ – Ko bolje prati domaći fudbal ovakve igre Čukaričkog je negde i očekivao. Spartak je pod vođstvom nekadašnjeg omladinca Crvene zvezde igrao na sličan način. Disciplina je konstanta, kreacija je nešto što donosi bodove. Čukarički ima trenutno najbolju odbranu u Superligi, što je zasluga pedantnog stručnjaka. Pre nego što se vratio u Srbiju, od Suduve je napravio najbolji tim Litvanije.
(FOTO: Star sport, MN Press)
text:
MEET CUKARICKI: Two Partizan bandits, one Zvezda scrap, Super League veterans, goalie breakthrough ...
Or how Aleksandar Veselinovic made a serious team
01 Nov 2019 by Darjan Nedeljkovic
When this summer, the leaders of Cukaricki, led by Mr Galet Obradovic, decided to sell Mudrinski, Kopitovic and Ovusu, many thought that Brdjani would not be racing high this season, but would seek out younger forces and want to become commercially interesting. That may have been the idea, but with the triumph against Partizan, Aleksandar Veselinovic's team turned their attention to themselves. Three points in the clash with the Cup Winner were the culmination of a great autumn of white and black. Chukaricki is second on the table, playing nice and disciplined. This is a story about guys who are heroes right now
DJORDJE PETROVIC - The Aleksandar Veselinovic bet he can win. One of the younger Superliga goalies. At the beginning of this season he was returned from a loan at IMT. Suddenly he got a chance instead of the more experienced Nikola Belic. He only conceded two goals.
NIKOLA CIRKOVIC - Superleague. Brought from Vozdovac to make up for damage after a serious injury to Miladin Stevanovic. And he's doing well for now.
STEFAN SAPIC - A stop of atypical material, over two meters high, was not even on the map. Even at the Čukarički Youth School, they did not consider it a top project. When he finished his education, he was sent on loan to Belgrade's Sinđelić. Duels with experienced strikers, who did not shy away from slamming his elbow into his ribs, helped him move forward. Make a lot of progress. Neither as a player nor as a man Stefan Šapić is fully formed. Very interesting material.



DARKO PUŠKARIĆ - He has been playing Superleague since 2009. It is clear that some attackers of our elite rank can also be guarded with a cigarette in their mouth. Coach on the field, an ideal partner to the much younger Stefan Sapic who can make progress with him. He knows the local league very well, serving as a consultant to the Red Star and Partizan fans when someone from the domestic clubs step up in red or black and white. Because he was always meeting someone. It is unlikely that Cukaricki would be in the second place without the popular Rifle.
MIROSLAV BOGOSAVAC - He is known most about him. He has already made his debut for the Serbian national team. The last four transitional deadlines tell us that the left back born in 1996 is safely leaving Serbia. There are drawbacks, first of all, when it comes to defensive play, but ... No one can dispute the fact that he is one of the best running backs in the league. Perfect ball control is his primary asset. He went through all the younger representative selections, it would have taken Partizan had Ivan Tomic stayed on the bench longer. Someone will say that black and whites made a big mistake.
MARKO DOCIC - A true super-league veteran. Needed by every team, the midfielder every coach of the local clubs would like. For three seasons, he was one of Javor's best players before borrowing Cukaricki's equipment. Works great free kicks and penalties. Little is known that last summer, the Red Star, looking for a Super League midfielder, chose between Docic and Dusan Jovancic.



STEFAN KOVAC - During his pioneering days, he was perhaps the Red Star's best player. However, he began to lose his status, especially when the Marakana club from Nis brought the Ilic brothers. He did not develop in the right way, he also had an unforgivable disciplinary outburst for which he failed. Still, he is well on his way to making a solid career. The Serbian league season, in IMT's jersey, helped him solidify. Has reached the Super League level. Will we see if it manages to rise?
IBRAHIMA NDIJAJE - When playing in Napredak from Krusevac, experienced Milorad Kosanovic humorously called him Ibra. Classic African Wing. Fast, penetrating, physically strong. Each team is capable of creating a serious problem. There are also moments of deconcentration when not present at all. He filled in on Ovus's slippers.
ASMIR KAJEVIC - In recent years, especially during the reign of Vladimir Matijasevic, Cukaricki has had a tradition of bringing Cronogorians. Stopper Kopitovic made a solid impression, Lagator could have done better. With a boss like Docić, the once great talent of BSK Borce looks solid in the midfield.
VELJKO BIRMANCEVIC - A true bandit trained in Zemunel, what he used to be, for example, was Aleksandar Mitrovic. Today, when he experiences the days of great affirmation, no one disputes that he is extremely talented and already ripe for more serious pursuits. Everyone will tell you in informal conversations that he needs to shape character and temperament, but that football's power is undeniable. Winged footballer whose run and the way he strokes the ball must fall in love at first sight. It handles even the heaviest belts easily, even easier in one-on-one situations. He was recognized by Ivan Tomic, but Partizan sent him to borrow from Rad and then by Cukaricki. He is now contracted to Brjan. He'll be hunting harder next summer.



FREE TEDIC - When he appeared on the big stage last fall, playing against the Red Star in Marakana, he showed that the Brjanci could have an extra-class striker in the near future. He played against Harry Partizan as Harry Kane and struck out both wings at odds. He came to Cukaricki as the top scorer of the cadet tournament in Bijeljina. The owners of Brđana Gale Obradović and Vladimir Matijašević took advantage of the great organizational crisis of Vojvodina and brought it to Belgrade. It wasn't bingo, it was a football jackpot. The modern striker was also recognized in Manchester City, for which Tedic signed a transfer worth 3,000,000 euros. He would have to make a representative career.

CHANGES

LUKA STOJANOVIC - Another rejected son of Partizan. He paid dearly for the guild to move to Sporting from Lisbon as a teenager. The hour of his career was already ticking at midnight, as he did not even need to borrow at Muscorn and Apollo. However, he was somewhat rehabilitated in Cukaricki. Yes, somewhat ... It still seems that he is not physically strained, but even in such circumstances the talent is noticeable. It has everything a midfielder needs. Review, quiet dog, creation, combinatorics, dribbling and shot.
MILUTIN VIDOSAVLJEVIC - The public met him this summer when Cukaricki played against Armenian Ararat. The boys played football, along with Birmancevic's audience on Banovo brdo, afforded a 90-minute round-robin that drove four rival defenders. Along with Tedic, the most talented player in Aleksandar Veselinovic's roster. He has to fix the realization.



Coach ALEXANDER VESELINOVIC - Who better to watch the local football of such a game of Cukaricki expected somewhere. Spartak played similarly under the guidance of the former Red Star youth. Discipline is constant, creation is something that brings points. Cukaricki currently has the best defense in the Super League, which is due to the pedantic expert. Before returning to Serbia, he made the best team of Lithuania from Suduva.
(PHOTO: Star Sport, MN Press)
